DOC.brief_summary: SMARTCARE-diabetes management system ' evaluate long-term effect patient diabetes .
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluate Effect Smart Care-diabetes Management System Subjects With Diabetes
DOC.detailed_description: Primary Outcome Measure : To see 's change HbA1C Visit 6 ( 12M ) compare Visit 2 ( baseline ) within group two group . All statistical analysis progress SAS ( Version 9.1 ) . statistical test 's significance level 0.05 . The principle two-sided test . Secondary Outcome Measures : To see 's change HbA1C Visit ( Visit 3 - Visit 6 ) compare Visit 2 ( baseline ) within group two group . Add Secondary Outcome Measure : Treatment satisfaction ( DTSQ , Diabetes Treatment Satisfaction Questionnaire ) : To see 's change treatment satisfaction score compare Visit 2 ( baseline ) within group two group .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Type 2 diabetes 2 . At least 1 year diagnose Type 2 diabetes 3 . 7.0 % ≤ HbA1c ≤ 10.0 % 4 . Agreed participate voluntarily study 1 . Severe chronic disease 2 . Diabetes mellitus complication 3 . Severe renal disease ; Serum creatinin > 1.5 ( men ) , > 1.4 ( woman ) 4 . Severe liver disease AST , ALT ≥ 2.5 x ULN 5 . Known take medication reliably 3 month screen visit 6 . Insulin pump user 7 . Being registered clinical research planning participate clinical research study 8 . Pregnant woman 9 . Illiterate 10 . Being assess irrelevant investigator
